explanation: [0-0] In the living room, a man in a gray shirt and yellow pants is bending over facing a sofa on the left, and a little boy in a black and gray striped shirt and black pants is standing on a colorful yellow, blue, and white mat, holding a toy broom and dustpan. In the background, there is a sofa with a green cushion and some dolls.
[0-2] Firstly, the man in the gray shirt takes out money from the sofa cushion and puts it in his back pocket. The boy in black pants turns to look, takes money out of his pocket, and runs away.

[2-10] Then the boy in black pants runs to the door. As the boy runs, we can see a silver refrigerator on the left side of the sofa, and a white coffee table with a microwave on it, along with some daily necessities. The boy in black pants runs to the shoe cabinet, opens it and takes out a pair of blue and white shoes, squats down and puts the money into his shoes, puts the shoes back, and closes the shoe cabinet door.
